commandDescription: Utlises SemVer incrementation to update package versions using the Major, Minor, Patch syntax in the sfdx-project.json
dependenciesDescription: If a package version is updated, update all package dependencies that list the package. If this flag is not specified, the user will be asked if they want to update the package version in dependencies
allPackagesDescription: Update all packages with version supplied with --version
versionDescription:
Options:
Major: when you make incompatible API changes
 Minor: when you add functionality in a backwards compatible manner
 Patch: when you make backwards compatible bug fixes. The version to update using SemVer versioning
